crew.overview: The short film tells the story of Edu, a man who lies in a large metropolis. The film approaches in a humorous way the problems and difficulties of living in a big city, in which appearances deceive and the simple act of daring to cross a street can be a problem.
crew.title: A Ilha

crew.overview: A starving calango decides that a cricket will be his next meal ... but things will not be as simple as he imagines.
crew.title: Calango!

crew.overview: A great inventor used to make useful things to everyone on his street, the Street of Tulips, after seeing the happiness of them all, decides that one person's happiness was still missing.
crew.title: Rua das Tulipas
